name.jp: オメガ・リファレクター

description.en: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.ar: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.br: Este item permite que você colete Mineral, Erons, Krasec e Guru dos Acumuladores. Recolhe uma quantidade muito alta de materiais.
description.cns: 使用该道具可以从灵兽体内收集奇异金属、绿磷石矿、炽红石花和石电磁矿。收集的材料数量最多。
description.de: Dieser Gegenstand ist zum Sammeln von Mineral, Erons, Krasec und Guru von Catchern. Sammelt eine sehr große Menge an Materialien.
description.fi: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.fil: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.fr: Cet item vous permet d'obtenir des Minéraux, Erons, Krasec et Guru sur les Catcher. Obtient une très haute quantité de matériaux.
description.id: Item ini memungkinkanmu untuk mengumpulkan Mineral, Erons, Krasec, dan Guru dari Catcher. Mengumpulkan jumlah material yang sangat tinggi.
description.it: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.jp: キャッチャーからミネラル、エランス、ケラセック、グルーを集めることができます。とても効率よく素材を集めることができます。
description.kr: 이 아이템은 캣처들에게서 미네랄, 에런스, 크라섹 그리고 구루를 수집할 수 있게 해줍니다. 매우 많은 양의 광석을 수집합니다.
description.nl: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.pl: Ten przedmiot pozwoli ci zebrać Minerał, Erony, Kraseki i Guru z Łapaczy. Wybiera bardzo dużą ilość materiałów.
description.ru: С его помощью добывают минералы из ловцов. Добывает почти все доступные минералы.
description.sp: Este objeto te permite recolectar Minerales, Erons, Krasecs y Gurus de los Catchers. Recolecta una cantidad enorme de materiales.
description.sw: This item allows you to collect Mineral, Erons, Krasec and Guru from Catchers. Collects a very high amount of materials.
description.th: ไอเท็มนี้ให้คุณรวบรวม Mineral, Erons, Krasec และ Guru จาก Catchers รวบรวมวัสดุจำนวนมาก
description.tw: 從捕手道具可讓你收集無機礦物,艾磷斯,石花,鈷礫。收集很大量的材料。
description.vi: Vật phẩm này cho phép bạn thu thập Mineral, Erons, Krasec và Guru từ Catchers. Thu thập một lượng nguyên liệu rất cao.
